verses.verse: May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> you in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble. <S%H6869><s%> May the name <S%H8034><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set you up on high, <S%H7682><s%>
send <S%H7971><s%> you help <S%H5828><s%> from the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> grant you support <S%H5582><s%> from Zion, <S%H6726><s%>
remember <S%H2142><s%> all your offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and accept <S%H1878><s%> your burnt sacrifice. <S%H5930><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
May He grant <S%H5414><s%> you your heart <S%H3824><s%>'s desire, <S%H4390><s%> and fulfill all your counsel. <S%H6098><s%>

We will triumph <S%H7442><s%> in your salvation. <S%H3444><s%> In the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> we will set up our banners. <S%H1713><s%> May Yahweh grant all your requests. <S%H3068><s%>

Now I know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saves <S%H3467><s%> his anointed. <S%H4899><s%> He will answer <S%H6030><s%> him from his holy <S%H6944><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> with the saving <S%H3468><s%> strength <S%H1369><s%> of his right hand. <S%H3225><s%>
Some trust in chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and some in horses, <S%H5483><s%> but we trust <S%H2142><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>
They are bowed down <S%H3766><s%> and fallen, <S%H5307><s%> but we rise <S%H6965><s%> up, <S%H5749><s%> and stand upright.
Save, <S%H3467><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Let the King <S%H4428><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> us when <S%H3117><s%> we call! <S%H7121><s%>
